description: The latest update adds support for FMyLife, My Life is Average, and attaching pictures via SMS! Now featuring content from more than 30 sites, including GraphJam and There I Fixed It! A new "Random Images" button allows you to see images from all categories! The perfect way to get a quick laugh when you're bored! LOL brings you easy access to millions of images uploaded and cleverly captioned by people around the world through the RSS feeds of the websites. With a flick of your finger, scroll through photos from popular websites such as I Can Has Cheezburger, I Has a Hotdog, Fail Blog, Engrish Funny, Up Next In Sports, Comixed, There I Fixed It and more. You can also quickly and easily share your favorite LOLs with your friends with the touch of a button.
